title: not playing lol in a while??
body: i just wanna know......if you dont play lol in a really long time will the acc be deleted or something? because im thinking of playing again.

replies.body: Accounts are never deleted, even the perma-banned ones. The only thing you have to worry about is Riot "resetting" your summoner name if you're inactive for too long (though, that's pretty unlikely to happen if you play a game every few months). Only way for an account to be deleted is to contact support and go through the process with them.
